author: Shostal Oleksandr
title: Gold from Waste - What Revolutionary Discovery Scientists Made
text:
Gold from Waste - What Revolutionary Discovery Scientists Made.
today, 06:20
68
Journalist
Shostal Oleksandr
today, 06:20
68
Scientists have developed a new method for extracting gold from electronic waste that is efficient and safe. They used proteins that form amyloid fibrils when heated, which help separate gold from other metals.
Research and Gold Extraction Process
Protein fibrils are converted into aerogel, which is used for gold extraction. Experiments have shown that this method can yield almost 91% pure gold with a content of nearly 22 carats.
Scientists believe that this new method could be an important step towards the ecological recycling of electronic waste and reducing the negative impact on the environment.
The presented text describes a new method for extracting gold from electronic waste that is more efficient and safer than previous methods. This method could contribute to more eco-friendly recycling of electronic waste and a reduction in harmful effects on the environment.Read also

author: Frank Reyes
title: New Pokémon Stadium-Like Mobile Game Announced at Pokémon Presents
text:
A new Pokémon battle-centered game called Pokémon Champions is coming to Nintendo Switch and mobile devices. Announced during the Pokémon Presents presentation, the game will focus on player-versus-player battles. From what can be seen in the trailer, it will allow for 2v2 battles and will also feature cross-play between smartphones and consoles.
Battles will feature all the traditional elements of the battle system from the mainline Pokémon games. That means species, abilities, moves, and more will be in play. On the other hand, it was revealed that this new game will be able to connect to Pokémon Home to use creatures from other related games.
Related
Fans Are Grieving For the Unreleased Pokémon N64 RPG That Never Was
A Pokémon RPG from the '90s has been revealed.
A New Battle-Focused Pokémon Spin-Off
During the Pokémon Presents presentation, Pokémon Champions was officially revealed, a new Pokémon battle-focused spin-off for Nintendo Switch and smartphones. This game will feature all the core battle mechanics of Pokémon games, such as type advantages and automatic abilities. Another special detail, as seen in the trailer, is that special moves from different generations will be available in one place, such as Mega Evolutions from Pokémon X/Y and Terastal Forms from Pokémon Scarlet/Violet.
The teaser shows a battle between a Dondozo and an Aegislash against a Charizard and a Hisuian Samurott. This confirms the possibility of bringing Pokémon from different games through the Pokémon Home connection, as the Aegislash is from Pokémon Sword/Shield, while the Hisuian Samurott is from Pokémon Legends: Arceus. Also emphasized was the possibility of cross-platform battles between consoles and mobile phones, a feature previously seen in the online MOBA Pokémon Unite.
Similar to Pokémon Stadium and Pokémon Colosseum, battles will take place in a Pokémon Battle Arena. This is the first time in nearly 20 years that a new spin-off focused on Pokémon battles has been announced, the last being Pokémon Battle Revolution for Nintendo Wii in 2006. This particular game allowed the Nintendo DS to be connected to use equipment from Pokémon Diamond, Pearl, and Platinum.
Related
Why There Needs To Be A Modern Pokémon Stadium Now More Than Ever
Between balancing casual and more competitive gameplay and the wealth of features, Pokémon Stadium needs a modern comeback.
This announcement has been the start of many discussions, as it presents an option focused on gamers who prefer the battles of the games rather than the exploration and adventure component. Rumors are already circulating that this could signal a change in the Pokémon competitive scene, abandoning the tournaments held in the mainline games and using this new Pokémon Champions as a special main platform for official ranked matches.
A release date has not yet been announced, and it has only been stated that Pokémon Champions is in development, but it's possible that this title may have connectivity features with games that will be released for the Nintendo Switch 2. One such game could be Pokémon Legends: Z-A, which is said to be available for both the new console and the original Nintendo Switch. Several new features were also recently revealed for this game.
Source: The Pokémon Company
topics: Arts, Culture and Entertainment->arts and entertainment

author: Andreia Takano
title: Anitta mostra registros no terreiro e perde 100k de seguidores
text:
Anitta mostra registros no terreiro e perde 100k de seguidores
Por Andreia Takano - 30/01/25 às 10:48
Anitta usou as redes sociais para compartilhar, pelos Stories, uma série de fotos de momentos em que aparece no terreiro que frequenta. Entre os registros publicados para seus mais de 64 milhões de seguidores, um deles mostra a artista ao lado de Sergio Pina, pai de santo do terreiro, e outros membros da comunidade.
Do Hanse se enfurece após saber de cancelamento de show no Brasil pela web
Porém, pouco depois da postagem, Anitta revelou ter perdido cerca de 100 mil seguidores em apenas uma hora.
A cantora não se intimidou e reagiu com ironia: “E lá se vão mais 100k seguidores. Toda vez que posto foto no terreiro é isso. Limpa, limpa, limpa.”
Em seguida, Anitta publicou uma foto de um livro com uma mensagem reflexiva: “A vitória cria o ódio, enquanto o derrotado vive na miséria. Um homem em paz vive feliz, desprezando as ideias de vitória e de derrota.”

author: ABNewswire
title: Revolutionizing Code Integrity: Codespy AI Detector Unveils
text:
Revolutionizing Code Integrity: Codespy AI Detector Unveils Cutting-Edge AI-Powered Source Code Analysis 04-02-2025 11:22 PM CET | Business, Economy, Finances, Banking & Insurance
Press release from: ABNewswire
Image: https://www.abnewswire.com/upload/2025/04/9a8bf2c7d745d47b0e63f75be09c3be9.jpg
Introduction
Artificial Intelligence (AI) is reshaping the programming landscape, making coding faster, more efficient, and more secure. AI-powered tools help detect vulnerabilities, optimize performance, and even generate code. Among these, AI-powered code detectors like Codespy AI Detector and AI Detector Pro have emerged as game-changers in source code analysis.
In this article, we'll explore how AI in programming enhances coding practices, dive into the functionalities of Codespy AI Detector and AI Detector Pro, and compare these two tools to help developers make informed choices.
Understanding AI in Programming
AI is revolutionizing the way developers write and review code. Some key advantages of AI in programming include:
*
Automating Repetitive Tasks - AI tools automate bug detection, code suggestions, and syntax corrections.
*
Enhancing Code Security - AI helps identify vulnerabilities and security risks within the source code.
*
Improving Code Quality - AI-driven analysis provides insights into best coding practices, making programs more efficient.
*
Detecting Plagiarism and AI-Generated Code - AI detectors analyze code originality and highlight similarities with existing projects.
What is Codespy AI Detector?
Codespy AI Detector is an advanced AI-powered tool designed to analyze source code and detect plagiarism, vulnerabilities, and AI-generated scripts. It helps developers maintain code integrity and ensures that software projects adhere to industry standards. Codespy AI Detector for Source Code [ https://codespy.ai/ ] is an advanced tool that helps developers detect plagiarism, AI-generated code, and security vulnerabilities with high accuracy.
Features of Codespy AI Detector:
*
AI Code Detection - Identifies whether a segment of code was written by a human or an AI model.
*
Plagiarism Detection - Compares source code against extensive databases to detect copied code.
*
Security Scanning - Detects potential vulnerabilities and security loopholes in the codebase.
*
Real-Time Analysis - Provides instant feedback to developers to improve code quality.
How It Works:
*
The developer submits source code for analysis.
*
The AI scans the code and matches it against various databases.
*
The tool highlights suspicious patterns, AI-generated content, and potential security risks.
*
Developers receive a detailed report with actionable insights.
Why Use Codespy AI Detector?
Using Codespy AI Detector offers multiple benefits for developers and organizations:
*
Ensures Code Authenticity - Detects copied or AI-generated content to maintain originality.
*
Improves Security - Identifies risks like SQL injections, buffer overflows, and other vulnerabilities.
*
Enhances Code Quality - Provides recommendations to refine and optimize programming practices.
AI Detector Pro: Advanced AI Code Detection
AI Detector Pro [ https://aidetector.pro/ ] is another powerful AI-based tool that specializes in identifying AI-generated code and evaluating source code authenticity. It is widely used in academia, software firms, and open-source communities.
Key Features of AI Detector Pro:
*
AI-Written Code Identification - Detects scripts generated by AI models like ChatGPT and Copilot.
*
Extensive Code Database - Compares source code against millions of projects to identify similarities.
*
Multi-Language Support - Works with various programming languages, including Python, Java, C++, and more.
*
Detailed Reports - Provides in-depth analysis of coding patterns and AI influence.
Use Cases for Developers:
*
Academic Integrity - Helps universities check for AI-assisted plagiarism in student assignments.
*
Enterprise Security - Assists software firms in ensuring compliance with coding standards.
*
Open Source Review - Analyzes open-source contributions for originality and security risks.
Image: https://lh7-rt.googleusercontent.com/docsz/AD_4nXfTkn5Z5CCMpyv4OhplsZu5VIalSVPSQnXeLLq03N-OWXpn_Hifcku6kHgJCoOOHlRSHcIk6_TPuy-11uANSBDZydGE464J5BB17srknwu9Iwur4OO4cLaLJ_MeaZkFn-Y?key=8Qn57iRrVidmvnocupx3OqPT
Comparison: Codespy AI Detector vs AI Detector Pro
Which One Should You Choose?
*
If you need comprehensive security scanning, go for Codespy AI Detector.
*
If your focus is on AI-generated content detection, AI Detector Pro might be a better fit.
*
Both tools offer plagiarism detection, making them valuable for developers and organizations.
The Future of AI in Programming
AI's role in programming is expanding rapidly. From AI-generated code to automated testing, AI-powered tools will continue to shape the industry. However, ethical concerns about AI-written code, intellectual property rights, and potential biases need to be addressed.
Conclusion
AI-driven code detectors like Codespy AI Detector and AI Detector Pro are transforming how developers analyze and secure their code. Whether you're a student, a professional developer, or an enterprise, these tools help ensure code originality, security, and efficiency. As AI technology advances, the future of programming will be even more automated and optimized.
